name: Le Labyrinthe de Lexicos
overview: You are captain of the UPS (United Planetary Systems). Using your ASTRO 2020 spacecraft you have just landed on the planet Morphinax. Your objective is to reach the seat of the supreme council, to uncover its secrets and to establish fruitful relationships with the inhabitants. So maybe you will find the trace of the missing telstor 3 rocket crew. You have ten days to reach the goal. Morphinax is populated by Roulasses, Borets and Flaquimarions with unexpected reactions. They sometimes have a bad temper and easily attack travelers who do not answer their questions correctly. In addition, we meet beings on this planet with terrifying powers ... You will need a lot of strength and intelligence to accomplish your mission. But, let's not forget, you are a Super Hero. Good luck! The people of Morphinax are crazy about vocabulary, the questions they will ask you will allow you to better know our language.
